PCOD

What is PCOD?

In PCOD, small lumps or multiple cysts are formed in the ovaries due to hormonal imbalance. Due to which the amount of male hormone starts increasing in the body, which leads to acne and facial hair start growing. Due to this problem, girls have to face irregular periods and many health problems.

Why Vedas Cure PCOD treatment is right for you?

Vedas Cure PCOD treatment is one of the best treatments for PCOD in India. This treatment has already treated thousands of females till now. Vedas Cure  PCOD medicines are made up of herbal composition and are 100% natural.  PCOD medicines are PCOD care & Kanchanar Guggulu.

PCOD Care contains herbs like kachnar chhal, ashok chhal, giloy, these herbs help to overcome the problem of irregular periods. Kanchanar Guggulu helps in pregnancy and other health-related problems.

Personalized Everything

There is No One Diet For Everyone

  • In the Indian diet during PCOD, high-fiber vegetables such as broccoli, mustard greens, spinach, sweet potatoes, green beans, cauliflower, snake gourd, and carrots should be consumed.
  • A PCOD diet plan recommends fruits such as mangos, bananas, plantains, apples, berries, guavas, pineapple, papayas, melons, pomegranates, and guavas. They are rich in fiber, highly nutritive, and can help satisfy sweet cravings.
  • There are many pulses included in a vegetarian diet plan for PCOD, such as split peas, green moong, yellow moong, dried beans, lentils, soybeans, chickpeas, and chana dal.

excerpt.rendered: PCOD What is PCOD? In PCOD, small lumps or multiple cysts are formed in the ovaries due to hormonal imbalance. Due to which the amount of male hormone starts increasing in the body, which leads to acne and facial hair start growing. Due to this problem, girls have to face irregular periods and many health […]
